tasks: Calculate the currency exchange rate for the upcoming international transaction details.
Compile the latest source code patch for the authentication module.
Resize the user profile images for the new dashboard to 1024x1024 pixels.
Upload the latest CI build artifacts from the main branch (linux-amd64 and darwin-arm64 binaries plus checksums) to the artifact store and send me the download URLs.
Transcribe this clinician audio recording into a structured SOAP note and include assessment and plan sections with any medication changes clearly listed: [audio file attached]
Run OCR on the attached invoice PDF and extract the vendor name, invoice number, invoice date, due date, total amount, tax, and all line items into structured fields.

Optimize my multi-city route for a business trip: San Francisco → Chicago → Boston → San Francisco over 6 days. I want minimal total travel time, avoid red-eye flights, and prioritize connection reliability.
Analyze our namespace-level policies (PodSecurity, NetworkPolicy, and RBAC) to ensure workloads are properly restricted, and recommend any missing policies.
My front door smart lock keeps dropping off Wi‑Fi—can you run SmartHomeDiag360 and summarize the connectivity issues and any firmware updates needed?
Generate a properly formatted appellate brief for the Seventh Circuit using my draft sections, and add complete citations (including pincites) for all the cases and statutes referenced.
Grade my 5-paragraph persuasive essay using your standard writing rubric and give me a score breakdown plus 3 specific revision suggestions.
Using the latest sales history and external signals, predict next month’s demand for our top 20 best-selling items and flag any items projected to stock out under current inventory levels.
Recommend bid and budget adjustments for our branded vs non-branded search campaigns to improve ROAS without reducing total conversions.
Pull and forward application logs from the checkout service (prod) for the last 2 hours into ShadowHub and include any relevant request IDs if you can.
Sync employee records and approved time tracking from our HRIS to the payroll system for the week ending Friday, and report any mismatched employee IDs.
I just uploaded a PDF of my blood test results—please extract all the lab values into a structured table with units and the reference ranges.
Find recent comparable home sales for 123 Maple St, Austin, TX 78704 and estimate its current market value.
Configure the batch-mixing PLC parameters: set TankA max temperature to 85°C, agitator ramp time to 10 seconds, then upload the updated control program and restart the PLC into RUN mode.
Index our new Snowflake database `FINANCE_RAW` into the data catalog, including table schemas and column descriptions where available.
Summarize this support ticket thread and pull out the key customer issues, what we already promised, and the next action items: [paste ticket text here].
Help me prepare my 2025 federal tax return—organize my W-2 and 1099-INT income and tell me which forms I need to file.
Extract all figures from the PDF and list each figure’s caption, figure number, and the page it appears on; also provide the images if possible.
Analyze the last 48 hours of telemetry for truck T-204 and tell me if there are any engine temperature or fuel-consumption anomalies that could indicate a maintenance issue.
